Rocklin.Maidu Museum & Historic Site:
The Maidu Museum & Historic Site is an Interpretive Center museum dedicated to public education about the Maidu peoples.
The museum sits at an ancient site where Nisenan Maidu families lived for 3,000 years. Hundreds of bedrock mortar holes, petroglyphs on sandstone boulders, rock art, and a vast midden area are evidence of thousands of years of residence.
